db.description: Lubu Mediterranean Restaurant is currently seeking to hire a cashier for day time shifts. Hours of work are from 8am-4pm Tuesday- Sunday.
db.requirement:
-experienced using POS system & credit card machine
- tidy, neat & well organised
- responsible and trustworthy
- able to make and receive guest bookings in English & Vietnamese by telephone
- order & receive daily bar stock
- able to work as a team

more.requirement: -experienced using POS system & credit card machine - tidy, neat & well organised - responsible and trustworthy - able to make and receive guest bookings in English & Vietnamese by telephone - order & receive daily bar stock - able to work as a team
